name: JTImageButton
summary: JTImageButton is a UIButton subclass that makes TITLE+IMAGE work easier.
description: **JTImageButton** is a UIButton subclass that makes TITLE+IMAGE work easier. Your image and title together WILL BE centered horizontally. You will be also able to resize provided image and change itâ€™s color easier, so basically all you have to provide is a text as a title and image (*NO MORE* image asset editing to get an image that you want in a button).
